item.title: [CF] 258E
item.description: I will share a solution to the problem CF 258E. Short statement You are given \(n\) boxes where \(i\)-th box contains \(f_i\) flowers. All flowers in a box are same color (indistinguishable) and there are no two flowers in the different boxes that have the same color. We want to select exactly \(s\) flowers from those boxes. Find out how many different ways to select in modulo \(10^9 + 7\).
